get.summary: Get page chunks with bounding boxes

parameters.description: The page number to retrieve chunks for

parameters.description: Optional search term to filter chunks by content

id.description: Unique identifier for this page chunks resource

chunk_index.description: Index of the chunk on the page

chunk_text.description: Text content of the chunk for accessibility

chunks.description: Array of chunks for the page
